mapper.delete: delete from `hellchang_schema_test`.`myRoutine` where id=#{id} and title=#{title} and target=#{target}
mapper.select: select * from `hellchang_schema_test`.`myRoutine` where id=#{id} and date = #{date}
select id,name,target,kg,rep from `hellchang_schema_test`.`myRoutine` where id=#{id} and date like CONCAT('%',#{date},'%')
select id,title,shared from `hellchang_schema_test`.`myRoutine` group by title

select myRoutine.* ,member.name as userName, member.image_path as userImage from hellchang_schema_test.myRoutine , hellchang_schema_test.member where myRoutine.id = #{id} and myRoutine.title = #{title} and myRoutine.id = member.id
mapper.update: update hellchang_schema_test.heart set heart = heart + 1 where id=#{id} and title = #{title}
mapper.select: select * from `hellchang_schema_test`.`heart` where id=#{id} and title = #{title}
select * from hellchang_schema_test.reply where id = #{id} and title = #{title} order by date desc limit 1
